747410.name: Dreamstones Soundtrack
747410.description:
The official soundtrack of Dreamstones contains all the music from the game and a few bonus tracks.

1 - Arcadia 4:17
2 - Crepuscular Rays 4:07
3 - Cycle Adjustment 2:57
4 - Delta Waves 3:44
5 - Derecho 3:33
6 - El Dorado 3:52
7 - Elysian Fields 4:07
8 - Erewhon 5:29
9 - Expanse (Interlude) 1:30
10 - Faerie 4:34
11 - Kenneth's Monologue 2:55
12 - Lucid Wanderer 3:35
13 - Melatonin (Interlude) 2:38
14 - Oneironauts 4:18
15 - Phosphenes 5:15
16 - Recall 5:53
17 - Soul Alchemy 2:55
18 - Submerged (Interlude) 3:22
19 - Thalamus 3:01

19 super smooth tracks for your listening pleasure. Music fresh from the mind of Injekted

Soundtrack supplied in MP3 format.
Files will be downloaded into the Dreamstones directory on your computer. Right click on Dreamstones in your Steam library and browse local files to retrieve the tracks.
747410.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
